summary: Fed up with the inhumane prison living conditions, a general prison riot breaks out, leading to hostage-taking, a stand-off with the guards and eventual negotiations with the prison administration officials.
cast: Neville Brand|Emile Meyer|Frank Faylen|Leo Gordon|Robert Osterloh|Paul Frees|Don Keefer|Alvy Moore|Dabbs Greer|Whit Bissell|James Anderson|Carleton Young|Harold J. Kennedy|William Schallert|Jonathan Hole|Robert Patten|William Phipps|Joel Fluellen|Roy Glenn|Joe Kerr|John Tarangelo|Robert Burton|James Matthews|Richard A. McGee|Robert Bice|Ralph Brooks|Benny Burt|Madge Cleveland|Tom Coleman|Jimmy Cross|Charles Ferguson|Frank Hagney|Thomas Browne Henry|Robert Keys|Harry Lauter|Robin Morse|William Newell|Harlan Wade|Ward Wood
title: Motín en el pabellón 11
